text:
It looks like the Demario Jackson and Corinne Olympios incident drum up interest for the show.

Last night the season 4 premiere, According to reports, Monday night’s anticipated premiere of “Bachelor in Paradise” wasted no time diving into the drama, even after host Chris Harrison addressed the near season-ending scandal surrounding the summer’s steamiest beach party. Click Here if you missed that.

In fact, the scandal just may have helped the ABC reality series reach its highest ratings yet.

Per Nielsen’s fast national ratings, the two-hour premiere scored five million total viewers and a 1.5 rating among the all-important adults 18-49 demo. That’s up from last year’s 4.6 million total viewers. In fact, in terms of total audience, only the series premiere has last night’s numbers beat, with the show debuting to 5.2 million Bachelor Nation fans.

Watch the full episode here.
title: ‘Bachelor in Paradise’ Returned for Season 4 With Some of Its Highest Ratings Ever/ Full Episode.
